## TimeoutPromiseOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TimeoutPromiseOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [message?](./pentf.timeoutpromiseoptions.message.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional error message to show when the timeout fires. |
|  [timeout?](./pentf.timeoutpromiseoptions.timeout.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Timeout in ms (by default 10000=10s) |
|  [warning?](./pentf.timeoutpromiseoptions.warning.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Only print an error message, do not throw. |
